column5: I'm doing some shopping for some relatives and was wondering what marinas around the Lindsay area might have some used smaller outboards and possibly 12-16ft aluminums for sale? Just wondering who you would recommend to go see.
check out lakeview marine near port perry corner of hwy 7 and 12 www.lakeviewmarine.ca call them ask if they got any thing you are looking  for
Just gave them a shout no luck though out of stock. Anyone else in the area worth a call?
is Brooklin to far out of the way?
check your PM then and good luck with Al.
Shopping for some  relatives ? what are you looking for , a sister? a cousin?
Robinson Marine has some used motors for sale. They are located in Lindsay.
perhaps you've already done this.....but depending on the amount of HP you want try looking on kijiji...I see lots of decent deals for smaller HP outboards....
Try anchor Line Marine Cameron just before turnoff to Fenelon Falls.  http://www.profilecanada.com/companydetail..._Line_Marine_ON
I'll give them a shout thanks alot guys   Kijiji is pretty dry right now but it'd be nice not to have to pay tax from the marina you know!
Another plug for Robinsons. They've been around for a long time, and they're the only ones around here that I let touch my engine. Great service from them, and nice people.  S.
